work_exps.title: Backend Python Web Developer, Software Engineer
work_exps.content: This cutting-edge Automation and Marketing platform for social media combines streamlined automation features like scheduled content posting with powerful marketing tools, including targeted ad campaigns and AI-driven trend analysis. Designed for ease of use and security, it empowers users to navigate the dynamic social media landscape with confidence.

work_exps.title: Python Developer
work_exps.content: Gathering and analyzing information as per customer needs, the project involves meticulous data cleaning. It culminates in the creation of a user-friendly web app, allowing seamless access, viewing, and filtering of data tailored to individual preferences.

work_exps.title: Bitrix PHP Developer
work_exps.content: My proficiency in developing a PHP-based plugin that seamlessly integrates the ZALO API with Bitrix24 CRM software is a testament to my technical expertise. This integration not only showcases my skills in PHP development but also enhances the functionality of Bitrix24 by seamlessly connecting it with the ZALO API, thereby facilitating effective communication and data management within the CRM platform. My contribution reflects a deep understanding of both technologies and a commitment to optimizing business processes through innovative solutions.

work_exps.title: FrontEnd Developer
work_exps.content: In my role as a Frontend Developer, I specialize in translating UI/UX design principles into code, crafting intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. My focus is on creating seamless and engaging digital experiences, ensuring that the frontend aligns seamlessly with the design vision to enhance overall user satisfaction and usability.

projects.title: TikiClawer
projects.skills: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Problem Solving, Web Scraping, Data Scraping, Data Analysis, Python (Programming Language), Selenium
projects.content: Developing a straightforward Tiki information gathering tool, I aim to streamline data extraction and export it into a CSV file, seamlessly compatible with Woocommerce. This tool will enable a hassle-free import process, facilitating efficient data transfer and integration into Woocommerce for enhanced usability and management.

projects.title: SocialMediaAutomation
projects.skills: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Problem Solving, Web Scraping, Flask, Automation, Python (Programming Language)
projects.content: This web app, constructed using Flask, serves as a versatile toolkit for social media automation. Leveraging the power of Flask, it provides users with an array of tools to streamline and enhance their social media automation processes.
